label: The Taming Power of the Small
i_ching_name: Xiao Chu / The Taming Power of the Small

shadow.name: INERTIA
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Taming Power of the Small, expressing through inertia

gift.name: FOCUS
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Taming Power of the Small, expressing through focus

siddhi.name: INVINCIBILITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Taming Power of the Small, expressing through invincibility

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 9 shadow frequency. The inertia you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural focus. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from inertia to focus.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your sacral. Notice the sensation of inertia.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 9 consciously for 7 days, the inertia pattern will shift toward focus.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 9 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from inertia toward focus
